mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_channel_custom where exists(select * from ujcms_channel t where t.id_ = ujcms_channel_custom.channel_id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_channel_custom (id_, channel_id_, name_, type_, value_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
